OverExposed is an online platform offering classic party games such as Truth or Dare, Never Have I Ever, Most Likely To, and Paranoia.
  • By using this website, you agree to do so responsibly and only for personal, non-commercial purposes.
  • You may not attempt to hack, disrupt, or misuse the platform in any way.
  • OverExposed reserves the right to update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the website after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

OverExposed values your privacy.
  • We do not require accounts or collect personal information to use the site.
  • The site may use your browser’s local storage to remember game settings, text-to-speech preferences, and selected packs.
  • We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use the site. This helps us improve game content and features.
    • Google Analytics collects non-identifiable information, such as pages visited, time spent on the site, and device/browser type.
    • This information is aggregated and cannot be used to personally identify you.
    • You can learn more about how Google collects and processes data by visiting Google’s Privacy & Terms.
  • Your information will never be sold or shared with third parties, except as required by law.

OverExposed uses cookies and local storage to improve your experience.

  • We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with the site. This helps us analyze traffic, improve content, and enhance features.
  • Google Analytics collects non-identifiable information such as pages visited, time spent on the site, and device/browser type.
  • This information is aggregated and cannot be used to personally identify you.
  • We also use your browser’s local storage to remember preferences such as game settings, text-to-speech options, and selected packs, so you don’t have to reconfigure them each visit.

You can disable cookies in your browser settings at any time, but some features may not function as intended.

OverExposed is designed for a variety of social settings.
  • We advise that users be at least 13 years old to use the site.
  • Some packs contain NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content intended for adults.
  • You must be 18 years or older to access NSFW content.
  • Minors may only use the site with non-NSFW packs.
  • It is your responsibility to ensure that you and those around you are comfortable with the chosen content.

OverExposed is provided for entertainment purposes only.
  • We are not responsible for any consequences, disputes, or outcomes that result from playing the games.
  • Participation is voluntary, and you may skip any question, dare, or prompt if you feel uncomfortable.
  • Use of the site is entirely at your own risk.

For legal questions, copyright concerns, or privacy requests, you can reach us at:
  • Email: overexposedgame@gmail.com
  • Instagram: @oe.app
